events.message: I received the package today, but unfortunately the product has several deep scratches and a cracked screen. It seems broken right out of the box.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to the customer's report of scratches and a cracked screen on arrival.
Support agent Maria Lopez has been assigned to assist with the reported product defect case.
Hello, this is Maria from support. I'm very sorry to hear about the damage to your product. Iâ€™ll do my best to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and cracked screen as well as the order number, so we can verify and begin processing?
I have uploaded the photos showing the cracked screen and scratches. The order number is 789654123. Please let me know what happens next, as this is very disappointing.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement unit at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let me know which option you would like.
I would prefer a replacement unit, but I want to be sure it will be thoroughly checked before shipping. Please confirm this.
Absolutely, the replacement product will undergo a full inspection before dispatch to ensure it arrives in perfect condition. We will update you with tracking information once it ships.
The replacement order has been processed and will ship today. We expect delivery within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and that everything is in perfect condition now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it is in excellent condition. Thank you for handling this so professionally.
We are glad to hear that the replacement product is satisfactory. The case will now be closed, and thank you for choosing our service.
